credit_line: Gift of Phyllis Henriquez Hecht Gammon and Edward Henriquez Hecht in memory of Mrs. Anita Henriquez Hecht and museum purchase through bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 268 x 247.5 cm (8 ft. 9 1/2 in. x 8 ft. 1 7/16 in.)
title: Bedcover
medium:
Medium: linen foundation, flax embroidery thread
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
description: A square bedcover with a wide border on all sides, a central medallion and smaller medallions in each corner, with an all-over floral lattice ground. The central medallion contains a double-headed eagle and the corner medallions each contain a fantastic beast.  The outer borders are linked repeats of an S-shaped floral vine.  All executed in light gold color flax thread on an off-white ground.
name: Bedcover
